backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining chatroom and messaging functionality with types for messages, chatrooms, reactions, user profiles, and image storage, plus access control integration and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles (with anonId and presetAvatar fields) to new simplified user profiles (name and avatarUrl only).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features: fixing image display for messages with imageId and preserving existing visual styles during the fix.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including App, hooks, Header, ChatArea, MessageBubble, MessageInput, and pages, detailing image upload, Giphy integration, and message rendering logic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags and versioned script import (v=203) to force fresh fetches in production.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup for lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditionally rendering header/footer and providing theme support.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for selecting avatars via file upload or Giphy search with debounced search, trending GIFs fallback, and avatar removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable messages filtered to exclude Creator messages without media (mediaUrl, imageId, or giphyUrl), reply preview, and auto-scroll on new messages.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, and message count. Fetches platform-specific thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media options (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video, or Twitter post). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views. Displays character count progress bar during username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, documenting that authentication is not used in this anonymous application.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with support for text, images, voice, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter embeds, reactions, pinning, and reply functionality. Handles reaction management, Twitter widget loading, and message highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Message input component with text entry, voice recording, image upload, GIF picker (Giphy integration), and link preview detection. Manages recording state, image compression, and debounced GIF search.
frontend/src/components/MessageInputLink: Renders preview cards for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter links detected in message input, fetching Twitter oEmbed data and displaying thumbnails/metadata for each platform.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned video (YouTube or Twitch) with an unpin button, rendering the appropriate iframe embed based on the media type.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, and time slider for voice messages, handling playback synchronization across multiple players.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until after a specified delay period has elapsed.
Hook that extracts and identifies the first YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter URL from a text string using regex matching.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, preventing empty arrays from blocking lobby display on first load.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, managing AuthClient lifecycle and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom operations (fetching chatrooms, messages, user profiles) and mutations (sending messages, reactions, creating chatrooms), plus image upload helper with localStorage-based blob storage and compression.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom on iOS, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Implements Giphy API integration for searching and fetching trending GIFs, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images while preserving orientation, with configurable quality and dimensions, and progress callback support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) with caching and request deduplication to avoid CORS issues.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/urlExtractor.ts: Extracts and identifies the first supported URL (YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter) from text strings using regex matching.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X platforms using regex pattern matching.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password authentication for viewing and deleting chatrooms, featuring category filtering and a table view of all chatrooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Individual chatroom page that loads chatroom data, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, plus a dialog for creating new chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme properties, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the current issue (images not displaying in chatroom messages) and requirements to fix image rendering without adding authentication or changing styles.
